channel.title: Need help making lvling zone
channel.description:
itd be nice if you could come on my ham serv i need to spawn leveling items and change xp rate and deleting objects network killapkscape or killapkscape1-3 pass 123 ip 5.92.222.143
i need to finish this at least so ppl have somethin to do theres a reward for this my friends the coder but hes offline right now.

ty guys ill leave server up anyway if u have any ideas about this please email beyboy54@hotmail.com (very old to lazy to change)

item.title: Need help making lvling zone
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

[quote=“inyuasha, post:1, topic:148079”]itd be nice if you could come on my ham serv
i need to spawn leveling items and change xp rate
and deleting objects
network killapkscape or killapkscape1-3
pass 123
ip 5.92.222.143

i need to finish this at least so ppl have somethin to do theres a reward for this
my friends the coder but hes offline right now.[/quote]To change the exp rate change the number after

addSkillXP(

Change it to any amount you want…for the object, if you don’t have it just get the makeGlobalObject method and add the object ID + X coords, Y coords, height, blah blah…you want to it. And the same goes for the deleteobject method, just add it.

~Rudolph

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making lvling zone
item.dc:creator: @A.E.M A.E.M.
item.description:
@A.E.M wrote:

[quote=“I pwnd you all, post:2, topic:148079”]createGlobalObject, deleteObject?

And when I read the thread name, I was thinking something like this:(I’ll make up coords)

if (absX >= 1111 && absX <= 1113 && absY > = 1111 && absY <= 1113) {
playerLevel[0] = 99; }

That would make standing in a certain spot give you 99 attack ;)[/quote]

NO THAT IS ALL WRONG

im not going ot help you but it has omsething ot do with adding global objects

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making lvling zone

item.description:
@I_pwnd_you_all wrote:

createGlobalObject, deleteObject?

And when I read the thread name, I was thinking something like this:(I’ll make up coords)

playerLevel[0] = 99; }

That would make standing in a certain spot give you 99 attack
